SYSTEM: Ontos_and_terminology-v1%28asun%29.pdf: Página 24
Lexicon
•
A lexicon is a list of words in a language (a vocabulary) along with some 
knowledge of how to use each word.
–
General or domain-specific; 
–
Monolingual (Wordnet)  or multilingual (Eurowordnet)
© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suarez de Figueroa, B. Villazón,  E.Montiel, G. Aguado, M. Espinoza
24
Ontological Engineering
speaker: SYSTEM
